Someone please help

item.title: Shop wont close, Firecape emote id's?DELTA
item.dc:creator: @Illadelph Illadelph
item.description:
@Illadelph wrote:

Ok so i got a cleaned delta and pre much just going to work. So my one of my problems is. I set up a shop Its all good But when i click on it, the trade screen is like perminant till i log off , theres no lagg cuz when i exit it it startsup in like 1 milesecond and even if i run on mini map its still open heres my code.

if(NPCID == 555){ openUpShop(WanneShop); WanneShop = 43; }

Also my firecape doesnt move. Im assuming because it doesnt have the firecape emote id’s so if someone could post them.

But heres the firecape so far i got

if(wearID == 6570){ playerSE = 1501; playerSEW = 1501; playerSER = 1501; playerSEA = 1501; }

The numbers are just random… I need the real ones to get moving firecape please.

Read full topic
